definitions.definition: An expert in a particular field, especially as called upon to provide comment or opinion in the media; a commentator , a critic .
A learned person in India; someone with knowledge of Sanskrit, philosophy, religion and law; a Hindu scholar.
A native surveyor in British India, trained to carry out clandestine surveillance beyond British borders.

main_definition: An expert in a particular field, especially as called upon to provide comment or opinion in the media; a commentator , a critic . [from 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: A learned person in India; someone with knowledge of Sanskrit, philosophy, religion and law; a Hindu scholar. [from 17th c.]
( historical ) A native surveyor in British India, trained to carry out clandestine surveillance beyond British borders.
